ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments:
In the first half of the course, you get a really good understanding of excel and excel solver. A very useful tool for optimizations. 

In the second half of the course, it is a bunch of statistics and review of random variable distributions. Depending on the previous courses you have taken, this may be a review.
learned a lot about the algorithms used for maximizing efficiency in varous business processes.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Amazing course. Great lectures. Taught at a pace where everything is very understandable and you don't feel lost when you move onto the next topic.

it's a great course, no faults to the professor but it just wasn't my passion... it's way more practical than most yale courses you're used to. that's something to keep in mind because it definitely kept me from really enjoying it. 

the only complain is the fact that they hosted OFFICE HOURS DURING DINNERTIME.... pls.... i want to eat with my friends, and not work on a p-set. if this class is offered again i would seriously hope they don't do that.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Absolutely. Professor Kaplan was by far the best teacher I have ever had. I learned so many valuable skills in this class thanks to Professor K's amazing guidance and experienced teaching.
is you're passionate about the material, yes. but make sure that you are passionate about it.
